document.full_text: joba chamberlain, rafael soriano and mariano rivera were perfect in relief, and curtis granderson and mark teixeira hit home runs for the yankees.
document.title: yankees 6, tigers 3: teixeira and revamped bullpen start strong for yankees in chilly opener
lines_and_colors: joba chamberlain, rafael soriano and mariano rivera were perfect in relief, and curtis granderson and mark teixeira hit home runs for the yankees.
